oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blacksmith
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edwin Best
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenback (Tenn.); Blacksmiths; Long, Clarence; Sexton, Tom; Scott, Thomas Ellison; Mattern, Don; Business;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Blacksmiths in Greenback. The man has a ball peen hammer in his right hand is and holding an item on the tip of the anvil. He wears an apron and a cap.
